TopicTitle: Contracts not being completed even after the requirements are met.

Articles.Content:
Hi! The issue is, as described in the title, that I cannot complete certain contracts (Altitude ones, generally).

I started having this problem when I installed some mods (30 according to CKAN).

KSP Version: .90 32bit

Mod List:

-Chatterer

-CIT - CITUtil

-CIT - Kerbal EVA Resource Transfer

-Community Resource Pack

-Contract Configurator

-Contract Window +

-DMagic Orbital Science

-Docking Port Alignment Indicator

-Final Frontier

-Firesplitter Core

-Karbonite

-KarbonitePlus

-Kerbal Alarm Clock

-KER

-KW Rocketry

-Mechjeb 2

-Mission Controller 2

-Mod Oriented Tech Tree (Unmanned)

-Module Manger

-Procedural Fairings

-Regolith

-SCANsat

-SienceAlert

-Stock Bug Fix Modules

-TechManager

-Toolbar

-Trajectories

-TweakScale

-Umbra Space Industriesl Tools

-Universal Storage

And here's a pic-example: http://imgur.com/GxLl1Mj

Thanks in advance!

Edited February 18, 2015 by Sempius
Altitude contracts need to be met with manned craft. I don't believe it's mentioned anywhere in the contract, but that's what's missing.
Well, that's embarrassing. I didn't know that. Thanks a lot though!
